intent_atoms.description: Add telemetry diagnostics for ResearchLogMonitor audits via CLI/SwiftUI to support VR-006 telemetry coverage.
ResearchLogTelemetryProbe and ResearchLogTelemetrySnapshot convert ResearchLogMonitor audits into telemetry diagnostics.
ResearchLogTelemetrySmokeTests exercise ParsePipeline-driven success, missing log, empty log, and schema mismatch scenarios to verify VR-006 telemetry across app and CLI entry points.
Telemetry backlog item #5 is marked complete and documented in project tracking artifacts.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogTelemetryProbe
functional_units.description: Converts ResearchLogMonitor audits into CLI/SwiftUI telemetry diagnostics for smoke coverage

functional_units.name: ResearchLogTelemetrySnapshot
functional_units.description: Captures snapshots of ResearchLogMonitor audits for telemetry diagnostics

functional_units.name: ResearchLogTelemetrySmokeTests
functional_units.description: Automated tests exercising ParsePipeline-driven success, missing log, empty log, and schema mismatch scenarios to verify VR-006 telemetry across app and CLI entry points
